summary: In the near future, Frank Grieves is a new breed of police officer working in a city where all recreational drugs are legal. When he is taken off a case involving an unidentified corpse, he discovers that legalization has come at a price.
cast: James Callis|Kerry Shale|Harry Lloyd|Elodie Yung|Elliot Cowan|Mark Ramsey|Robert Bathurst|Molly Gaisford|Louis Trefgarne|Cosima Shaw|Josef Altin|Adam Sims|Nicky Henson|Rufus Wright|Jonathan Pryce|Simeon Willis|Jon Campling|Nyasha Hatendi|Charlie Evans|Gordon Peaston|Brona C. Titley|Geoffrey Breton|Jonathan Schey|Matthew Kitsell|James Payton|Leon Sua|Bryce Jackson|Sonu Louis|Sonny Louis|Tim Barrow|Fiona Ryan|Annabel Norbury|Nana Amoo-Gottfried|Kane Sharpe|Orion Lee|Michelle Forde|David Kaye|Khurram Butt|Kern Sorzano|Phelim Kelly|Mark Stedman|Rob Marni|Benjamin Cross|Beau Fowler|Bruce Holder|Nicola Millbank|Ross O'Hennessy|Lucy Pearman|Jill Stanford|Carl Sykes
title: Narcopolis
